title: Can't get Hextech Chests
body: Can't get any Hextech Chests, just got 2 yeasterday, and I can still find 2, but I when I do S It doesn't drop anything, I did like 3 S in a Row with Katarina. :( Is this a bug?

replies.body:
Hi dude this is the Italian board!

About your question, you can't get any more chests on Katarina because you can get only one for each champion for each season. Try playing different champions! :)
Ok, so I can just get chest if other players get S if I play the same champion?

> [{quoted}](name=NeoLeggend,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=5fq4v76h,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-04-10T14:42:20.081+0000)
>
> Ok, so I can just get chest if other players get S if I play the same champion?

No :(
U can get 1 chest with 1 champ. If U get 3 Times S katarina U can get just 1 chest. If U get S with Rumble and Taric U get 2 Chest.
